name: Mad Bot
description:
This is a little game  savuzyelim and I made for the Indie Game Dev Begginers #003. In this game you play as an robot who is in a post-apocaliptic world. You try to survive against other robots. It is a fun little roguelike shooter.

Didn't had enough time to add replay after death but you can replay it if you press R.

Controls :

Left click to Shoot.

Hold M to Open Minimap.

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move.

Space to Use Special Move.

P to Pause The Game or Change The Volume.

R to Reset.
